name: Pit Escape
description:
Pit Escape is an action-packed endless beat-em-up-esque game. One of the main attacks is a single ball that you can throw around. This ball is known as a minion and you must pick it up to use it again.

You can also play this game on a controller. I just didn't write down the inputs for the in game text, but for a PS4 controller, X is jump, square is attack, and triangle is pick up item.
